info.title: Legacy Appeals
info.description: This will be the documentation for the legacy appeals section of the Decision Reviews API dev docs

get.summary: Returns eligible appeals in the legacy process for a Veteran.
get.description: Returns eligible legacy appeals for a Veteran. A legacy appeal is eligible if a statement of the case (SOC)  or supplemental statement of the case (SSOC) has been declared, and if the date of declaration is within the last 60 days.

parameters.name: X-VA-SSN
parameters.description: Either X-VA-SSN or X-VA-File-Number is required. Example X-VA-SSN: 123456789

parameters.name: X-VA-File-Number
parameters.description: Either X-VA-SSN or X-VA-File-Number is required. Example X-VA-File-Number: 123456789

200.description: Returns eligible legacy appeals for a Veteran

errors.title: Invalid length
errors.detail: '' did not fit within the defined length limits

errors.title: Invalid pattern
errors.detail: '' did not match the defined pattern

errors.title: Invalid length
errors.detail: '12n-~89' did not fit within the defined length limits

errors.title: Invalid pattern
errors.detail: '12n-~89' did not match the defined pattern

detail.example: Received a 500 response from the upstream server

zipCode5.description: 5-digit zipcode. Use "00000" if address is outside the United States
5-digit zipcode. Use "00000" if address is outside the United States

contestableIssue.description: A contestable issue (to contest this, you include it as a RequestIssue when creating a HigherLevelReview, SupplementalClaim, or Appeal)

ratingDecisionReferenceId.description: The BGS ID for the contested rating decision. This may be populated while ratingIssueReferenceId is nil

description.example: Service connection for hypertension is granted with an evaluation of 10 percent effective July 24, 2005.

titleOfActiveReview.description: Title of DecisionReview that this issue is still active on

sourceReviewType.description: The type of DecisionReview (HigherLevelReview, SupplementalClaim, Appeal) the issue was last decided on (if any)

timely.description: An issue is timely if the receipt date is within 372 dates of the decision date.

latestIssuesInChain.description: Shows the chain of decision and rating issues that preceded this issue. Only the most recent issue can be contested (the object itself that contains the latestIssuesInChain attribute).

isRating.description: Whether or not this is a RatingIssue

documentUploadMetadata.description: Identifying properties about the document payload being submitted

veteranFirstName.description: Veteran first name. Cannot be missing or empty or longer than 50 characters. Only upper/lower case letters, hyphens(-), spaces and forward-slash(/) allowed.

veteranLastName.description: Veteran last name. Cannot be missing or empty or longer than 50 characters. Only upper/lower case letters, hyphens(-), spaces and forward-slash(/) allowed.

fileNumber.description: The Veteran's file number is exactly 9 digits with no alpha characters, hyphens, spaces or punctuation. In most cases, this is the Veteran's SSN but may also be an 8 digit BIRL number. If no file number has been established or if it is unknown, the application should use the Veteran's SSN and the file number will be associated with the submission later in the process. Incorrect file numbers can cause delays.

zipCode.description: Veteran zip code. Either five digits (XXXXX) or five digits then four digits separated by a hyphen (XXXXX-XXXX). Use '00000' for Veterans with non-US addresses.

source.description: System, installation, or entity submitting the document

docType.description: VBA form number of the document

items.description: A contestable issue (to contest this, you include it as a RequestIssue when creating a HigherLevelReview, SupplementalClaim, or Appeal)

ratingDecisionReferenceId.description: The BGS ID for the contested rating decision. This may be populated while ratingIssueReferenceId is nil

description.example: Service connection for hypertension is granted with an evaluation of 10 percent effective July 24, 2005.

titleOfActiveReview.description: Title of DecisionReview that this issue is still active on

sourceReviewType.description: The type of DecisionReview (HigherLevelReview, SupplementalClaim, Appeal) the issue was last decided on (if any)

timely.description: An issue is timely if the receipt date is within 372 dates of the decision date.

latestIssuesInChain.description: Shows the chain of decision and rating issues that preceded this issue. Only the most recent issue can be contested (the object itself that contains the latestIssuesInChain attribute).

isRating.description: Whether or not this is a RatingIssue

attributes.description: If informal conference requested (`informalConference: true`), contact (`informalConferenceContact`) and time (`informalConferenceTime`) must be specified.

zipCode5.description: 5-digit zipcode. Use "00000" if Veteran is outside the United States

timezone.description: Veteran's timezone. Used for adding the current date to the signature according to the veteran's local time. If not specified, the current UTC date will be used for the signature (which may be ahead or behind the local date).

claimant.description: If the claimant is a non-Veteran, claimant information is required. Without this information, we will be unable to identify the claimant. If you're a healthcare provider or an employee of a healthcare provider requesting review of a VA payment decision, you must identify the healthcare provider as the claimant and complete all relevant information in the claimant object.

zipCode5.description: 5-digit zipcode. Use "00000" if Veteran is outside the United States

timezone.description: Claimant's timezone. Used for adding the current date to the signature according to the claimant's local time. If not specified, the current UTC date will be used for the signature (which may be ahead or behind the local date).

informalConferenceRep.description: The Representative information listed MUST match the current Power of Attorney for the Veteran.  Any changes to the Power of Attorney must be submitted via a VA 21-22 form separately.

id.description: ID from VACOLS (Veteran Appeals Control and Locator Service)

decisionDate.description: Date of the Appeal's original decision.

latestSocSsocDate.description: Date of the Appeal's most recent SOC/SSOC (Statement of Case/Supplemental Statement of Case)

allOf.$comment: the phone fields must not exceed 20 chars, when concatenated

allOf.description: Veteran's timezone. Used for adding the current date to the signature according to the veteran's local time. If not specified, the current UTC date will be used for the signature (which may be ahead or behind the local date).

claimant.description: If the claimant is a non-Veteran, claimant information is required. Without this information, we will be unable to identify the claimant. If you're a healthcare provider or an employee of a healthcare provider requesting review of a VA payment decision, you must identify the healthcare provider as the claimant and complete all relevant information in the claimant object.

allOf.$comment: the phone fields must not exceed 20 chars, when concatenated

allOf.description: Claimant's timezone. Used for adding the current date to the signature according to the claimant's local time. If not specified, the current UTC date will be used for the signature (which may be ahead or behind the local date).

requestingExtension.description: Set to true to request a filing extension. An extensionReason must be provided if true.

extensionReason.description: Explanation why you believe there is good cause for the extension. If an extensionReason is provided, requestingExtension must be true.

appealingVhaDenial.description: Set to true if you are appealing a denial of benefits by the Veterans Health Administration (VHA).

nodCreateResponse.description: Successful response of a 10182 form submission

detail.description: Human readable error detail. Only present if status = "error"

location.description: Location to which to PUT document Payload

updatedAt.description: The last time the submission was updated

createdAt.description: The last time the submission was updated

nonBlankString.$comment: The pattern used ensures that a string has at least one non-whitespace character. The pattern comes from JavaScript's \s character class. "\s Matches a single white space character, including space, tab, form feed, line feed, and other Unicode spaces. Equivalent to [ \f\n\r\t\v\u00a0\u1680\u2000-\u200a\u2028\u2029\u202f\u205f\u3000\ufeff].": https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Guide/Regular_Expressions/Character_Classes  We are using simple character classes at JSON Schema's recommendation: https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-handrews-json-schema-validation-01#section-4.3

benefitType.description: If the contested issue is a Disability Compensation issue, acknowledgement of form 5103 is required - see form5103Acknowledged.

allOf.$comment: the phone fields must not exceed 20 chars, when concatenated

allOf.description: Veteran's timezone. Used for adding the current date to the signature according to the veteran's local time. If not specified, the current UTC date will be used for the signature (which may be ahead or behind the local date).

claimant.description: If the claimant is a non-Veteran, claimant information is required. Without this information, we will be unable to identify the claimant. If you're a healthcare provider or an employee of a healthcare provider requesting review of a VA payment decision, you must identify the healthcare provider as the claimant and complete all relevant information in the claimant object.

allOf.$comment: the phone fields must not exceed 20 chars, when concatenated

allOf.description: Claimant's timezone. Used for adding the current date to the signature according to the claimant's local time. If not specified, the current UTC date will be used for the signature (which may be ahead or behind the local date).

evidenceSubmission.description: Evidence may be uploaded up to 7 days from the 'created_at' date of the associated Supplemental Claim via 'supplemental_claims/evidence_submissions'.

evidenceType.description: 'upload' indicates that the Veteran has supplied additional evidence as uploaded documents. 'retrieval' indicates that the Veteran has supplied contact information for facilities holding evidence relevant to the claim; the 'retrieveFrom' field will contain the facility's contact information.

form5103Acknowledged.description: The 5103 Notice regarding new & relevant evidence must be acknowledged when the issue(s) being contested is a Disability Compensation issue. The notice can be found here: http://www.va.gov/disability/how-to-file-claim/evidence-needed. If the issue(s) being submitted are Disability Compensation and 'No' is selected, the API will return an error.  Please ensure the Veteran reviews the content about the 5103 Notice at the link above.

scCreateResponse.description: Successful response of a 200995 form submission

detail.description: Human readable error detail. Only present if status = "error"

location.description: Location to which to PUT document Payload

updatedAt.description: The last time the submission was updated

createdAt.description: The last time the submission was updated
